name: A.T Inks Max Hitachi
description: A.T Inks Max Hitachi Grade is the darkest and strongest optical density solvent based inkjet printing ink in at ink portfolio that can be printed using multiple printheads. Max grade offers the highest outdoor light vastness in any at ink product with excellent color gamut. It is best suitable for graphics applications using pvc flex and self adhesive vinyl substrates. Max series has a moderate pricing when compared to competitors in similar product segment.
